title: Too many trolls lately?
body: Why am I matching feeders and trolls everygame? They purposely do this then surrender or just afk half way through. The past week has been brutal while dealing with this..

replies.body: Ranked games are fucked up especially in silver hell. 4v6 or 3v7 all the time. Always 1 or 2 teammate that play against you. You keep killing and they keep feeding, like a fucking actor (player who gets paid to troll). The amount of troll there is fucking unbelievable.
It could be bad luck, there has always been a lot of toxic players, i too think i see more of these now than a few months (maybe a year) ago but maybe some people can say they tend to see less

At least bad players try to win, and honestly I can go 31/7 and can't kharry because my team doesn't listen to me and do jackshit and wood division plays. 

Trolls are literally on the enemy team. :/

Like who here feels great about winning a game because the enemy laner/players were boosted animals and try to fight you when you're 3/0 and have morde's 3rd q ready and all of his cooldowns (morde's cds) up? I don't.  And it's tough to carry layers like this and then they say in /all chat "Omg" or the lux support "gg noob team vs pro team". She plays lux support, is behind, and doesn't get sightstone.

Most of these people aren't trolls, they are kids under pressure and not reacting well.  I rarely have trolls in my game, the key is to not annoy people with your bad gameplay.

Most trolling is just a reaction to your bad plays and attitude.
